FuncDef: The display local-user command displays information about local users. The display local-user command displays information about local users.
CLIs: display local-user [ domain <domain-name> | username <user-name> | state { active | block } ]

ParaDef.Info:
Displays information about local users in a specified domain.
The domain name must exist.

Displays information about a specified local user name.
The value is a string of 1 to 253 case-sensitive characters. It cannot contain spaces.

Indicates the status of the local user.
-

Examples: <HUAWEI> display local-user state block username test2
ExtraInfo: The command output helps you check the configuration of local users and isolate faults related to the local users.
